content.text: Hey there, I'm looking to find some new friends. What do you like to do for fun?
Hey! I like to stay active to avoid feeling anxious. What are some of your hobbies?
I love to play music and go out to eat with friends. I also have a dog named Tiki!
My dog is my best friend! My cat passed away a few years ago and I'm not sure I'll ever get another one.
I'm sorry to hear about your cat. I love animals, but I don't have any pets of my own right now.
I'm excited to try new recipes with my George Foreman grill. Have you ever used one?
No, I haven't! I've heard they're great though. I'm not much of a cook, but I'm always looking for new ways to make my food healthier.
They're really easy to use and they make great grilled chicken!
I might have to check one out. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! It sounds like we have a lot in common. I'd love to get together sometime and do something fun.
That sounds great! I'm free this weekend if you want to grab a bite to eat or go for a walk.
This weekend sounds perfect! I'll message you my number
